Peringati Hari Guru, Kemenag Gelar Lomba Senam-Vlog Guru Madrasah
01 Nov 2019, 08:07 by Jefrie Nandy Satria
Jakarta - Dalam menyambut Hari Guru Nasional, Kementerian Agama (Kemenag) menggelar serangkaian lomba. Menteri Agama (Menag) Fachrul Razi yang juga telah hadir, dalam sambutannya, menyampaikan harapannya bagi para generasi muda.
"Kita harapkan ini semakin maju untuk membangun masa depan anak-anak kita yang akan memimpin kita di masa yang akan datang," kata Menag Fachrul Razi di Kementerian Agama, Jalan Lapangan Banteng Barat, Sawah Besar, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Perlombaan diawali dengan lomba senam yang diikuti 600 orang guru madrasah se-Jabodetabek yang tiap kelompoknya terdiri dari 15 orang.
Pantauan detikcom di lokasi, pukul 07.00 WIB, ratusan guru ini sudah berbaris rapi untuk senam di lapangan Kemenag. Menag Fachrul berharap kegiatan ini dapat membuat para peserta bergembira dan menjadi sehat.
"Selamat melakukan senam. Pertama-tama yang penuh kegembiraan. Menang atau kalah urusan nanti deh. Yakin kita lakukan dengan semangat dan membuat kita sehat," sambungnya.

Commemorating Teacher's Day, Ministry of Religion Holds Madrasah Teacher-Gymnastics Vlog Competition
01 Nov 2019, 08:07 by Jefrie Nandy Satria
Jakarta - In welcoming the National Teacher's Day, the Ministry of Religion (Kemenag) held a series of competitions. The Minister of Religion (Menag) Fachrul Razi who was also present, in his speech, expressed his hope for the younger generation.
"We hope this will progress to build the future of our children who will lead us in the future," said Minister of Religion Fachrul Razi at the Ministry of Religion, Jalan Banteng Barat Street, Sawah Besar, Central Jakarta, Friday (1/11 / 2019).
The competition began with a gymnastics competition which was attended by 600 madrasa teachers throughout Jabodetabek, each group consisting of 15 people.
AFP monitoring on location, at 07.00 WIB, hundreds of these teachers have lined up neatly for gymnastics in the Ministry of Religion. Minister of Religion Fachrul hopes that this activity can make the participants happy and healthy.
"Happy doing gymnastics. First of all full of excitement. Win or lose business later. Sure we do it with enthusiasm and make us healthy," he continued.
